Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I am wary of what the AI says because they can be very wrong with the information. I only use feedback that it provides as a guideline rather than fact. With teachers, they can give better feedback as they might be more up to date with knowledge.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: teacher can be more personable and is more aware of what they are expecting. AI doesn't know what the uni expects to cant tailor the advice.
